name: 施青良
objective: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
schedule:
1) 4A Would You Get Out Alive / unreal conditionals
2) 4B How I Trained My Husband / past modals; would rather
3) 4C Let Your Body Do The Talking / verbs of senses
4) 5A The Psychology of Music / gerunds and infinitives
5) 5B Counting Sleep / used to; be used to; get used to
6) 6A Presentation Disasters
7) 7A I Wish You Wouldn't.../ structure after wish
8) 7B A Test of Honesty / clause of contrast and purpose
9) 7C Tingo / relative clauses
scorePolicy:
除了學校規定之全校會考之外，評分項目也包括
期中評量　Midterm Exam 20%
期末評量　Final Exam 20%
課堂練習　In-class Exercise 60%
materials:
Required Textbook
Oxenden, Clive and Christina Latham-Koenig. American English File 4B. New York: Oxford University Press, 2009.
